dc:title: Hospices Needed
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Praises the liturgical work of Monsignor Hellriegel of St. Louis calling his parish "a fountain of living waters." Calls for more hospices (houses of hospitality) run by the laity. Says the Mass is the foundation for knowing, loving and serving God in the poor.
